Alessandra Buonanno has become the first Italian woman to win the Dirac medal
extended: The Dirac Medal is the name of four awards in the field of theoretical physics, computational chemistry, and mathematics, awarded by different organizations, named in honour of Professor Paul Dirac, one of the great theoretical physicists of the 20th century. Professor Buonanno is honored for pioneering accurate and rapid computation of waveforms that are crucial in detecting gravitational waves.

title: Hottest Recorded Temperature in Europe's History: 48.8ºC
extended: Hardly something to be celebrating: this is the symptom of something terrible happening to our planet, but it's a unique event putting Italy yet again on the map in this weird 2021, and it deserves to be here

title: Giada Luppi win the Junior Women Free Skating Gold Medal
Giorgio Parisi wins Nobel Prize in Physics
extended: The prize was awarded for the discovery of the interplay of disorder and fluctuations in physical systems from atomic to planetary scales. He will be sharing it with Syukuro Manabe and Klaus Hasselmann for their work in the physical modeling of Earth’s climate, quantifying variability and reliably predicting global warming.
